dynaForm.name: myInfo
dynaForm.USR_COUNTRY: SELECT IC_UID, IC_NAME FROM ISO_COUNTRY ORDER BY IC_NAME Country PaísPaísPaís
dynaForm.USR_CITY: SELECT IS_UID, IS_NAME FROM ISO_SUBDIVISION WHERE IC_UID = "@#USR_COUNTRY" ORDER BY IS_NAME State or RegionEstado o RegiónEstado da União
dynaForm.USR_LOCATION: SELECT IL_UID, IL_NAME FROM ISO_LOCATION WHERE IC_UID = "@#USR_COUNTRY" AND IS_UID = "@#USR_CITY" AND IS_UID NOT IN ("") ORDER BY IL_NAME LocationUbicaciónCidade
dynaForm.USR_REPORTS_TO: SELECT USR_UID, CONCAT(USR_LASTNAME, " ", USR_FIRSTNAME) FROM USERS WHERE USR_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY USR_LASTNAME Reports to
dynaForm.USR_REPLACED_BY: SELECT USR_UID, CONCAT(USR_LASTNAME, " ", USR_FIRSTNAME) FROM USERS WHERE USR_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY USR_LASTNAME Replaced by
dynaForm.USR_ROLE: SELECT ROL_CODE AS USR_ROLE, ROL_CODE AS CODE FROM ROLES WHERE ROL_SYSTEM = '00000000000000000000000000000002' ORDER BY ROL_CODE RoleRolPapel
